item.title: Waiting Room Bypass Rules
item.description: Waiting Room Bypass RulesA Waiting Room Bypass Rule is a type of Waiting Room Rule built on Cloudflareâ€™s Ruleset Engine and managed via the Waiting Room API. A Waiting Room Bypass Rule allows you to indicate specific traffic or areas of your site or application that you do not want a waiting room to apply to. Each bypass rule is created and managed at the individual waiting room level for precise control over your waiting room traffic.
